General.Name: WithTech Inc.
General.Description: WITHTECH Co., LTD. engages in manufacturing of environment, and process and material monitoring products for the semiconductor and display industries in South Korea. It offers environment monitoring products, including ammonia, acid gas, individual/multi-gas, total AMCs, ozone, TVOC, fast multi organic gas, and highly concentrated organic gas monitoring systems; utility monitoring products, such as metal and ion monitoring systems; process monitoring products comprising FOUP and wafer contamination monitoring systems, as well as FOUP cleaners; and industrial environment monitoring products, including emission gas and effluent monitoring systems. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Daejeon, South Korea.
